name: Pohinki Simulator
storyline: You wake up in the middle of the forest as a person known as "Hu Man", from now on, your day-to-day life is roaming the streets in search for trash, after you collect what is needed to survive the next day, the choice of what you will be doing in your free time is yours - collecting scrap, becoming a thief, exploring the woods, building a base or going to a giant spider's BBQ party - you decide!
summary: Pohinki Simulator is a survival game set in a polish neighbourhood, where you need to explore the open world in search for trash in order to survive and gain power. Explore the forgotten streets of Tarnow and find the treasures that others threw away in this abstract reality, filled with secrets waiting to be discovered.
